column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2022
column14: One of my all-time favorite make up products is lipstick. But given the pandemic and the need for wearing masks all the time it’s kind a hard to enjoy wearing a nice lipstick. But I heard about this color and this product and I could not pass up the beautiful red color. I absolutely love the color it is beautiful color! Perfect red color for people that are of fall type coloring brunettes etc. it’s a very good red/burgundy color, very smooth, long lasting, and doesn’t get everywhere. I couldn’t love it more!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
column14: In a time of mask wearing… one wonders… why were lipstick. Well, I was having problems wearing mask and drying out my lips. I tried products for dry lips… didn’t last long. This lipstick was great for keeping my lips moist and the color even lasted when I removed the mask.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
column14: Good pigment but slides on lips and off lips easily. Use with a lip liner or just chose another brand

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
column14: Love this lip stick beautiful shade and stays on for several hours.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2019
column14: Definitely not a long wear lipstick fades quickly

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2019
column14: Love the color and feel of this lipstick. Does not dry the lips neither.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2021
column14: Gorgeous color! Shipped faster than expected

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
column14: I wish the lipstick would stay on longer.  With that said, I would definitely buy it again.
